mapper.select: /*getClientList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE (EMP_NAME_KR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR ACCOUNT_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%') OR RES_REGIS_NUM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchValue}, '%'))
/*getProjectData*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.REG_DT, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as PJT_REG_DT FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT A WHERE A.PJT_CD = #{PJT_CD} LIMIT 1
/*getEmpInfo*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_SEQ = #{sn}
/*checkExnpDetData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payAppDetSn}
mapper.insert:
/*insCorpProject*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_CORP_PROJECT ( PM_EMP_SEQ, PM_EMP_NAME, PM_DEPT_SEQ, PM_DEPT_NAME, LINK_PJT, CORP_PJT_NM, CORP_PJT_SUB_NM, STR_DT, END_DT, SBJ_SEP, REG_EMP_SEQ, PROFIT_CODE ) VALUES ( #{empSeq}, #{empName}, #{deptSeq}, #{deptName}, #{linkPjt}, #{pjtNm}, #{pjtSubNm}, #{strDt}, #{endDt}, #{sbjSep}, #{regEmpSeq}, #{profitCode} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_PJT_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_CORP_PROJECT'
mapper.select: /*getCorpProjectList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_CORP_PROJECT
/*getCorpProjectData*/ SELECT A.*, DATE_FORMAT(A.STR_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS STR_DT2, DATE_FORMAT(A.END_DT, '%Y%m%d') AS END_DT2 FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_CORP_PROJECT A WHERE CORP_PJT_SN = #{corpPjtSn}
mapper.update: /*updCorpProject*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_CORP_PROJECT SET PM_EMP_SEQ = #{empSeq}, PM_EMP_NAME = #{empName}, PM_DEPT_SEQ = #{deptSeq}, PM_DEPT_NAME = #{deptName}, LINK_PJT = #{linkPjt}, CORP_PJT_NM = #{pjtNm}, CORP_PJT_SUB_NM = #{pjtSubNm}, STR_DT = #{strDt}, END_DT = #{endDt}, SBJ_SEP = #{sbjSep}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, PROFIT_CODE = #{profitCode} WHERE CORP_PJT_SN = #{corpPjtSn}
mapper.insert:
/* insIncmExpInfo */ INSERT INTO CAM_MNG.DJ_PROJECT_BUDGET_MNG ( PJT_CD, BGT_CD, BGT_AT, BGT1_NM, BGT2_NM, BGT3_NM, CALC_AM, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_DATE ) VALUES
( #{item.pjtCd}, #{item.bgtCd}, #{item.bgtAt}, #{item.bgt1Nm}, #{item.bgt2Nm}, #{item.bgt3Nm}, #{item.calcAm}, #{item.regEmpSeq}, NOW() )
mapper.select: /* getProjectBgtList */ SELECT PJT_CD, BGT_CD, BGT_AT, BGT1_NM, BGT2_NM, BGT3_NM AS BGT_NM, CALC_AM FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PROJECT_BUDGET_MNG WHERE PJT_CD = #{pjtSn} AND ACTIVE = 'Y'
/* getProjectBgtCheck */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PROJECT_BUDGET_MNG WHERE PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND ACTIVE = 'Y'
mapper.update: /* incmExpInfoActiveN */ UPDATE CAM_MNG.DJ_PROJECT_BUDGET_MNG SET ACTIVE = 'N' WHERE PJT_CD = #{pjtCd}
mapper.insert:
/*insDjCardList*/ INSERT INTO CAM_MNG.DJ_CARD_INFO(CLTTR_CD, TR_CD, JIRO_NM, BA_NB, DEPOSITOR, TR_NM, CARD_BA_NB) VALUES
( #{item.TR_CD}, #{item.TR_CD}, #{item.JIRO_NM}, #{item.BA_NB}, #{item.DEPOSITOR}, #{item.TR_NM}, #{item.CARD_BA_NB} )
INSERT INTO CAM_MNG.DJ_DEPO_SETTING (FR_PJT_SN, PJT_CD, PJT_NM, BUDGET_SN, BUDGET_NM, REG_EMP_SEQ) VALUES (#{frPjtSn}, #{aftPjtCd}, #{aftPjtNm}, #{budgetSn}, #{budgetNm}, #{regEmpSeq})
mapper.update: UPDATE CAM_MNG.DJ_DEPO_SETTING SET PJT_CD = #{aftPjtCd}, PJT_NM = #{aftPjtNm}, BUDGET_SN = #{budgetSn}, BUDGET_NM = #{budgetNm}, MOD_DT = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE FR_PJT_SN = #{frPjtSn}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_DEPO_SETTING WHERE FR_PJT_SN = #{frPjtSn}
SELECT * FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_DEPO_SETTING WHERE FR_PJT_SN = #{frPjtSn}

/*getExnpDeChangeRs*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_CHNG_RS WHERE 1 = 1
AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert:
/*insDjEtaxUp*/ INSERT INTO CAM_MNG.DJ_ETAX_INFO ( ISS_NO, CO_CD, DIV_CD, TR_CD, ISS_DT, TAX_TY, ISU_DT, DIVREG_NB, DIVSUB_NB, DIV_NM, DIVCEO_NM, TRREG_NB, TRSUB_NB, TR_NM, TRCEO_NM, SUM_AM, SUP_AM, VAT_AM, ETAX_TY, ETAX_FG, SEND_FG, DUMMY1, DUMMY2, ISS_YMD, ITEM_DC, ADDTAX_CD, ADDTAX_AM, ADDRTE_RT, EMAIL_DC, TRCHARGE_EMAIL, INSERT_DT, ST_TR_CD, TR_FG, REG_NB, CEO_NM, BUSINESS, JONGMOK, ZIP, DIV_ADDR1, ADDR2, TEL, FAX, BA_NB, INTER_DT, LIQ_WS, LIQ_RS, USE_YN, CLTTR_CD, JIRO_CD, DEPOSITOR, TR_NMK, ATTR_NMK, BA_NB_TR, AREA_CD, GUGUN_CD, BANK_NM ) VALUES
( #{item.ISS_NO}, #{item.CO_CD}, #{item.DIV_CD}, #{item.TR_CD}, #{item.ISS_DT}, #{item.TAX_TY}, #{item.ISU_DT}, #{item.DIVREG_NB}, #{item.DIVSUB_NB}, #{item.DIV_NM}, #{item.DIVCEO_NM}, #{item.TRREG_NB}, #{item.TRSUB_NB}, #{item.TR_NM}, #{item.TRCEO_NM}, #{item.SUM_AM}, #{item.SUP_AM}, #{item.VAT_AM}, #{item.ETAX_TY}, #{item.ETAX_FG}, #{item.SEND_FG}, #{item.DUMMY1}, #{item.DUMMY2}, #{item.ISS_YMD}, #{item.ITEM_DC}, #{item.ADDTAX_CD}, #{item.ADDTAX_AM}, #{item.ADDRTE_RT}, #{item.EMAIL_DC}, #{item.TRCHARGE_EMAIL}, #{item.INSERT_DT}, #{item.ST_TR_CD}, #{item.TR_FG}, #{item.REG_NB}, #{item.CEO_NM}, #{item.BUSINESS}, #{item.JONGMOK}, #{item.ZIP}, #{item.DIV_ADDR1}, #{item.ADDR2}, #{item.TEL}, #{item.FAX}, #{item.BA_NB}, #{item.INTER_DT}, #{item.LIQ_WS}, #{item.LIQ_RS}, #{item.USE_YN}, #{item.CLTTR_CD}, #{item.JIRO_CD}, #{item.DEPOSITOR}, #{item.TR_NMK}, #{item.ATTR_NMK}, #{item.BA_NB_TR}, #{item.AREA_CD}, #{item.GUGUN_CD}, #{item.BANK_NM} )
mapper.select:
/*getApproveExnpList*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP WHERE
DT3 = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND RE_STAT = 'N' AND PAY_APP_TYPE = 1
/*getAccountInfoOne*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_INSIDE.DJ_ACCOUNT_INFO WHERE ACCOUNT_TO_SN = #{accountToSn}
/*getCurrentAmountStatus*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_HR.ERP_HIST_ACCT_CONSOL_TR WHERE ACCT_NO = REPLACE(#{bankNB},'-','') ORDER BY ACCT_TXDAY DESC, ACCT_TXTIME DESC, ACCT_TXDAY_SEQ DESC LIMIT 1

/*getIncpBudgetDetailViewData*/ SELECT AA.* FROM ( -- 수입반제 SELECT B.PAY_INCP_SN, B.EVID_TYPE, A.PJT_CD, '' AS PAY_APP_SN, 'Y' AS PAY_APP_TYPE, B.BUDGET_SN, B.BUDGET_NM, B.RE_STAT, A.APP_CONT, A.PAY_EXNP_DE, B.CRM_NM, (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_RE S WHERE S.PAY_INCP_SN = A.PAY_INCP_SN) AS TOT_COST, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HR WHERE HR.EMP_SEQ = A.REG_EMP_SEQ) AS EMP_NAME, A.INFO_CODE FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_RE B ON A.PAY_INCP_SN = B.PAY_INCP_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 100 AND B.PAY_INCP_RE_SN IS NOT NULL AND B.EVID_TYPE IN (1,3,5) AND A.BUDGET_SN LIKE CONCAT(#{bgtCd}, '%') GROUP BY A.PAY_INCP_SN UNION ALL -- 수입반제(부분) SELECT B.PAY_INCP_SN, B.EVID_TYPE, A.PJT_CD, '' AS PAY_APP_SN, 'N' AS PAY_APP_TYPE, B.BUDGET_SN, B.BUDGET_NM, 'N' AS RE_STAT, A.APP_CONT, A.PAY_EXNP_DE, B.CRM_NM, (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_DET S WHERE S.PAY_INCP_SN = A.PAY_INCP_SN) - (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_RE S WHERE S.PAY_INCP_SN = A.PAY_INCP_SN) AS TOT_COST, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HR WHERE HR.EMP_SEQ = A.REG_EMP_SEQ) AS EMP_NAME, A.INFO_CODE FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_RE B ON A.PAY_INCP_SN = B.PAY_INCP_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 100 AND B.PAY_INCP_RE_SN IS NOT NULL AND B.EVID_TYPE IN (1,3,5) AND A.BUDGET_SN LIKE CONCAT(#{bgtCd}, '%') AND ((SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_DET S WHERE S.PAY_INCP_SN = A.PAY_INCP_SN) - (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_RE S WHERE S.PAY_INCP_SN = A.PAY_INCP_SN)) != 0 GROUP BY A.PAY_INCP_SN UNION ALL -- 수입반제(작성X) SELECT B.PAY_INCP_SN, B.EVID_TYPE, A.PJT_CD, '' AS PAY_APP_SN, 'N' AS PAY_APP_TYPE, A.BUDGET_SN, A.BUDGET_NM, 'N' AS RE_STAT, A.APP_CONT, A.PAY_EXNP_DE, B.CRM_NM, (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_DET S WHERE S.PAY_INCP_SN = A.PAY_INCP_SN) AS TOT_COST, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HR WHERE HR.EMP_SEQ = A.REG_EMP_SEQ) AS EMP_NAME, A.INFO_CODE FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_DET B ON A.PAY_INCP_SN = B.PAY_INCP_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 100 AND B.EVID_TYPE IN (1,3,5) AND A.BUDGET_SN LIKE CONCAT(#{bgtCd}, '%') AND A.RE_STAT = 'N' GROUP BY A.PAY_INCP_SN UNION ALL -- 수입 SELECT B.PAY_INCP_SN, B.EVID_TYPE, A.PJT_CD, '' AS PAY_APP_SN, 'N' AS PAY_APP_TYPE, B.BUDGET_SN, B.BUDGET_NM, A.RE_STAT, A.APP_CONT, A.PAY_EXNP_DE, B.CRM_NM, (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP S WHERE S.PAY_INCP_SN = A.PAY_INCP_SN) AS TOT_COST, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HR WHERE HR.EMP_SEQ = A.REG_EMP_SEQ) AS EMP_NAME, A.INFO_CODE FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_DET B ON A.PAY_INCP_SN = B.PAY_INCP_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 100 AND B.EVID_TYPE IN (2,4,6,7) AND A.BUDGET_SN LIKE CONCAT(#{bgtCd}, '%') GROUP BY B.PAY_INCP_SN UNION ALL -- 반납 SELECT A.EXNP_SN AS PAY_INCP_SN, B.EVID_TYPE, A.PJT_CD, A.PAY_APP_SN, A.PAY_APP_TYPE, B.BUDGET_SN, B.BUDGET_NM, A.RE_STAT, A.EXNP_BRIEFS, A.EXNP_DE, B.CRM_NM, (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET S WHERE S.EXNP_SN = A.EXNP_SN) AS TOT_COST, (SELECT EMP_NAME_KR FROM CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO HR WHERE HR.EMP_SEQ = A.REG_EMP_SEQ) AS EMP_NAME, A.INFO_CODE FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET B ON A.EXNP_SN = B.EXNP_SN WHERE 1=1 AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND A.DOC_STATUS IN (100, 101) AND B.BUDGET_SN LIKE CONCAT(#{bgtCd}, '%') GROUP BY B.EXNP_SN ) AA ORDER BY AA.PAY_EXNP_DE DESC
mapper.insert: /*setRndProjectPrevNextAmt*/ INSERT INTO CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_GOVT_PROJECT_AMT ( PJT_SN, PREV_SALE_AMT, PREV_INCP_AMT, NEXT_SALE_AMT, NEXT_INCP_AMT, REG_EMP_SEQ, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{pjtSn}, #{prevSaleAmt}, #{prevIncpAmt}, #{nextSaleAmt}, #{nextIncpAmt}, #{regEmpSeq}, NOW() )
mapper.update: /*updRndProjectPrevNextAmt*/ UPDATE CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_GOVT_PROJECT_AMT SET PREV_SALE_AMT = #{prevSaleAmt}, PREV_INCP_AMT = #{prevIncpAmt}, NEXT_SALE_AMT = #{nextSaleAmt}, NEXT_INCP_AMT = #{nextIncpAmt}, MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq}, MOD_DT = NOW() WHERE GOVT_PJT_SN = #{govtPjtSn}
mapper.select: /*getRndProjectPrevNextAmt*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_GOVT_PROJECT_AMT WHERE GOVT_PJT_SN = #{govtPjtSn}
/*getCorpProjectDataByCd*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_CORP_PROJECT WHERE CORP_PJT_CD = #{corpPjtCd};
/*getExistProject*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_OVER_PAY WHERE PJT_CD = #{pjtCd}

/*getIncpACost*/ SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOT_COST), 0) AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_DET B ON A.PAY_INCP_SN = B.PAY_INCP_SN WHERE ((B.EVID_TYPE IN (2,4,6,7) AND A.DOC_STATUS IN (100, 101)) OR (B.EVID_TYPE IN (1,3,5) AND A.RE_STAT = 'Y')) AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND REPLACE(A.ACC_NO, '-', '') = #{baNb}

/*getIncpBCost*/ SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOT_COST), 0) AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_DET B ON A.PAY_INCP_SN = B.PAY_INCP_SN WHERE ((B.EVID_TYPE IN (2,4,6,7) AND A.DOC_STATUS IN (100, 101)) OR (B.EVID_TYPE IN (1,3,5) AND A.RE_STAT = 'Y')) AND A.PJT_CD != #{pjtCd} AND REPLACE(A.ACC_NO, '-', '') = #{baNb}

/*getIncpCCost*/ SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOT_COST), 0) AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_INCP_DET B ON A.PAY_INCP_SN = B.PAY_INCP_SN WHERE ((B.EVID_TYPE IN (2,4,6,7) AND A.DOC_STATUS IN (100, 101)) OR (B.EVID_TYPE IN (1,3,5) AND A.RE_STAT = 'Y')) AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND REPLACE(A.ACC_NO, '-', '') != #{baNb}

/*getExnpACost*/ SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOT_COST), 0) AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET B ON A.EXNP_SN = B.EXNP_SN WHERE A.RE_STAT = 'Y' AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND REPLACE(A.ACC_NO, '-', '') = #{baNb}

/*getExnpBCost*/ SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOT_COST), 0) AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET B ON A.EXNP_SN = B.EXNP_SN WHERE A.RE_STAT = 'Y' AND A.PJT_CD != #{pjtCd} AND REPLACE(A.ACC_NO, '-', '') = #{baNb}

/*getExnpBCost*/ SELECT IFNULL(SUM(TOT_COST), 0) AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET B ON A.EXNP_SN = B.EXNP_SN WHERE A.RE_STAT = 'Y' AND A.PJT_CD = #{pjtCd} AND REPLACE(A.ACC_NO, '-', '') != #{baNb}
/*getExistProjectPayData*/ SELECT * FROM CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT_PAY WHERE PJT_CD = #{pjtCd}
mapper.insert: /*insProjectBudgetStatus*/ INSERT INTO CAM_MNG.DJ_PROJECT_BUDGET_STATUS ( PJT_CD, PJT_NM, PJT_STR_DT, PJT_END_DT, ACC_NO, PETTY_CASH, INCP_BUDGET_AMT, INCP_BUDGET_SUB_AMT, EXNP_BUDGET_AMT, EXNP_BUDGET_SUB_AMT, IBRANCH_AMT, REG_DT ) VALUES ( #{pjtCd}, #{pjtNm}, #{pjtStrDt}, #{pjtEndDt}, #{bankNB}, #{pettyCash}, #{incpBudgetAmt}, #{incpBudgetSubAmt}, #{exnpBudgetAmt}, #{exnpBudgetSubAmt}, #{ibranchAmt}, NOW() )
